name: Racing Rumble
description:
Racing Rumble is an Arcade style racing game where the play takes control of 1 of 3 cars of their choice,  it is your task to set the best lap that you can. What car will you choose? What time can you set? Find out in Racing Rumble.

Controls:
  • WASD:- Movement 
  • Left Shift:- NOS/Boosting
  • Esc:- Pause Game
  • R:- Respawn
Assets Used:
  • Low-Poly Farm Pack by JustCreate on Unity Asset Store
  • Barrier and Cone Assets by Sabri Ayes on Unity Asset Store
  • RTI Car Model by Bear Interactive on Unity Asset Store
  • Farm Animal Pack by Vertex Cat on Unity Asset Store
  • Low-Poly Road Pack by Broken Vector on Unity Asset Store
  • Paladins Font by Iconian Fonts on FontSpace
  • Car Sound Loop by Yaroslav_Novikov on OpenGameArt
  • NOS boost sound originally from Need For Speed Underground
